TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract ISessionStateItemCollection implements class System.Collections.ICollection, class System.Collections.IEnumerable
type ISessionStateItemCollection = interface interface ICollection interface IEnumerable

summary.span: 为 ASP.NET 会话状态使用的集合定义协定，以管理会话。

span.span: Defines the contract for the collection used by ASP.NET session state to manage session.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 接口定义由 类向应用程序代码公开的会话项的集合。The interface defines the collection of session items exposed to application code by the class. 接口的 ASP.NET 实现是 类。The ASP.NET implementation of the interface is the class. 如果创建派生自 类的类来存储会话数据，则可以使用 类来管理存储的对象，或在自己的集合管理器中实现 接口。If you create a class derived from the class to store session data, you can either use the class to manage the stored objects or implement the interface on your own collection manager. 如果实现 接口，则还必须创建一个继承 类的类，以便使用您的 实现来管理会话变量。If you implement the interface, you must also create a class that inherits the class in order to make use of your implementation to manage session variables. 实现还必须实现 接口的成员。An implementation must also implement the members of the interface. ## Examples 下面的代码示例实现 ，并使用 类存储会话状态变量名称和值。The following code example implements the and uses the class to store session-state variable names and values. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性来确定是否修改了 实现中的值。The property is used by the to determine whether the values in an implementation have been modified. 在实现 接口时，应将 属性初始化为 `false`，并将 属性设置为 `true`、或 方法的实现中的 。In implementing the interface, you should initialize the property as `false` and set the property to `true` in the implementations of the , , or methods. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示 属性的实现。The following code example shows an implementation of the property. 有关 接口的完整实现的示例，请参阅 接口概述提供的示例。For an example of a complete implementation of the interface, see the example provided for the interface overview. param.name: name
param.span: 要从集合中删除的项的名称。

span.span: The name of the item to delete from the collection.
Deletes an item from the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在实现 方法时，应将 属性设置为 `true`，以指示已修改 实现中的值。In implementing the method, you should set the property to `true` to indicate values in the implementation have been modified. 如果 实现不包含具有指定 `name`的元素，则集合应保持不变且不引发异常。If the implementation does not contain an element with the specified `name`, the collection should remain unchanged and no exception be thrown. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示 方法的实现。The following code example shows an implementation of the method. 有关 接口的完整实现的示例，请参阅 接口概述中提供的示例。For an example of a complete implementation of the interface, see the example provided in the interface overview.
